package:
dcsl_state_estimator 0.1.0 The dcsl_state_estimator package contains dcsl_miabot_state_estimator node and dcsl_miabot_estimator_math library. The purpose of this package is to provide an extended Kalman-Bucy filter that takes in state measurements and control inputs to estimate the current poses of the differential-drive Miabots in the system. Brendan Andrade -->
BSD
http://ros.org/wiki/dcsl_state_estimator
